com.timmcvicker.budgetminder

Class BudgetDatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
      • com.timmcvicker.budgetminder.BudgetDatabaseHelper

  • public class BudgetDatabaseHelper
extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
    Used to manage the internal database for the app
    Version:
    14

      • onConfigure

        public void onConfigure(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)

        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        db - instance of the SQLite database

      • onCreate

        public void onCreate(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db)
        Called when the database is created for the FIRST time, creates desired table. If a database already exists on disk with the same DATABASE_NAME, this method will NOT be called.
        Specified by:
        onCreate in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - instance of SQLite database for this app

      • onUpgrade

        public void onUpgrade(android.database.sqlite.SQLiteDatabase db,
                      int oldVersion,
                      int newVersion)
        Called when the database needs to be upgraded. This method will only be called if a database already exists on disk with the same DATABASE_NAME, but the DATABASE_VERSION is different than the version of the database that exists on disk.
        Specified by:
        onUpgrade in class android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
        Parameters:
        db - instance of SQLite database
        oldVersion - old version of database
        newVersion - new version of database. hard coded as constant at top of class

      • addUser

        public void addUser(java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.Integer userId)
        Adds a user to the internal database to aid in username lookup
        Parameters:
        username - the username of the user to add to the database
        userId - the primary key in the external database for the user

      • doesUserExist

        public boolean doesUserExist(java.lang.String username,
                             android.content.Context context)
        Checks whether the username exists in the internal database (to prevent duplicate registering)
        Parameters:
        username - desired register name
        context - application context (for showing alert)
        Returns:
        true if user exists, false otherwise

      • syncUsers

        public void syncUsers(android.content.Context context)
        helper method to sync internal and external users
        Parameters:
        context - application context

      • finishSyncUsers

        public static void finishSyncUsers(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> externalUsers,
                                   android.content.Context context)
        Called at the end of the sync users method in RestHelper. Loads users from external db to internal
        Parameters:
        externalUsers - map of external users (userId maps to username)
        context - application context

      • updateUser

        public void updateUser(java.lang.String oldUsername,
                       java.lang.String username)
        Updates internal usernames
        Parameters:
        oldUsername - previous username
        username - username to be updated
